TEXT.TITLE: AMERICANA HOTELS <AHR> TO REPURCHASE SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Americana Hotels and Realty corp said it intends to repurchase up to 400,000 of its common shares, or about seven pct, in the open market or privately from time to time. Reuter
